description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the elevation of privilege vulnerability identified as CVE-2024-26241, it is essential to apply the relevant updates available. Follow these steps to ensure your system is secure:

1. Verify the system build number to ensure compatibility with the updates.
2. Download and install the following KB Articles:
   - KB-5036925
   - KB-5036909
   - KB-5036899
   - KB-5036896
   - KB-5036894
   - KB-5036893
   - KB-5036892
3. Restart your system after installation to apply the changes.

**Details**:
- This vulnerability, categorized under CWE-416 (Use After Free), primarily impacts Windows systems and can lead to elevation of privileges by an attacker.
- Ensure your system is running any of the affected build numbers before proceeding with the updates.
- For further reference, you can consult the official documentation at: https://msrc.microsoft.com/update-guide/vulnerability/CVE-2024-26241.
